items.content_html: got-scraping-client is a lightweight and efficient tool for web scraping tasks using the popular Got HTTP client. It simplifies data extraction from web pages by providing a straightforward API and built-in support for handling common challenges like pagination and rate limiting.

items.content_html: Simple Portfolio Website is a modern, responsive web application featuring a contact form built using React, Tailwind CSS, and EmailJS. This project enables users to send messages directly via email without needing a backend server, making it an ideal solution for portfolios, personal websites, or lightweight business pages.
